We try to do small things with great love.

lenders.occupational_info: Random jobs until my masters degree is complete. Until then, the adventures of parenthood await.

lenders.name: TC Golf Team
lenders.loan_because: Helping others is part of the culture of our Catholic High School. We like the fact that money repaid can be reloaned and thus can benefit more people than just a single recipient of charity.
lenders.occupational_info: A sponsor of the Tampa Catholic Golf Team donates money for each birdie scored in practice rounds and matches. In 3 years the team has earned $1,145 for Kiva and continues to reloan the money as it is repaid.

I also have a blog that promotes clothing items from independent and emerging designers around the world.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: I feel this is a great way to reach out and help someone make a better life for themselves.  I like the idea of investing in someone's good idea, hard work, and optimism.  It is only a small contribution but I hope it makes a difference to someone and their family.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the sustainable home building industry.  This is a small and developing industry in Canada, but one that will hopefully influence the way all homes in Canada are eventually built.  My industry uses only renewable and natural materials to build homes without sacrificing comfort and durability.  It is a very rewarding field of work

lenders.loan_because: We loan because in these difficult times, too many people are needy.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I lost my home because the banks wouldn't help me. So I know what its like to work hard and have nothing. I want to see my work make a difference and help people, not make some bank rich.

lenders.loan_because: A cool micro sized thing  I can do to help someone I'll never know realize their hopes and dreams.

lenders.name: Francisco
lenders.loan_because:
El bienestar economico es fundamental para el bienestar familiar. Mi esposa y yo recientemente empesamos una familia. Tenemos una niña de 7 meses y un niño de 2 años. Creemos que los niños deben de tener futuro y oportunidad, no solo en nuestro pais, pero alrededor del mundo.

Economic well being is essential to the well being of a family. My wife and I recently started a family. We have a 7 month-old daughter and a two year-old  son. We believe that children should grow up with a opportunity, not only in our country, but around the world.

Soy maestro de quinto grado. Enseño lenguaje, matematicas, sciencias, historia. Mis estudiantes tienen 10 y 11 años.

I am a fifth grade teacher. I teach language, mathematics, science and history. My students are 10 and 11 year olds.

lenders.name: Birgit
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed to live in financial saftey and I want to pass some of it to people who are less lucky then me.

lenders.name: Lea
lenders.loan_because: I work hard for my income and  it allows me some luxuries that I could and have easily taken for granted living in the US.  I'd rather help someone else raise their standard of living than continue to take for granted luxuries that I don't really need.  A young lady from Uzbekiistan stayed wtih me for a week and she felt like a princess in my guest bedroom which, in our world, is a small and inelegant room used for an office, storage with a small bed for a guest.  She humbled me and allowed me to see my blessings with different eyes.  It doesn't take much to make this world a better place.  How easy is it to make these loans - there's dignity in allowing people to own their financial responsibilities.  Donations are great, but if this money can get recylced over and over and make a difference in multiple entrepreneurs' lives, I'm thrilled!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a financial aid officer at a private secondary school. Without financial assistance, almost half of our students would not be able to attend our exceptional school.  20% of our students come from countries other than the United States.  I assess a family's need for financial assistance.  This educational experience transforms many lives.

lenders.name: Branko
lenders.loan_because: the procurement of new equipment for production. CNC machines
lenders.occupational_info:
manufacturing windows, doors and furniture from hard wood as well as
manufacturing mobile homes-lodges

In our offer we also have room and front doors, windows in Euro
standard, kitchen, dinning and bathroom furniture made from hard wood
or wood boards.
The materials used in the process are of high quality, and then coated in ECO lacquering product in choice several colors.

Besides furniture and carpentry we also manufacture low ground mobile
homes, old lodge style with crossed angles.
Homes are suitable for seaside or mountain and tourist areas as well
as weekend cabins. Sizes from 7 to 14 square meters are our garden
houses with one room and enclosed terrace. Over 14 m2 we can add more
rooms.

We have all neccesary equipment including log cutting unit, drying
room and all accessories for carpentry and a laquering room.

We are located in a mountain area where nature is still intact and we
are also planning to start growing and drying of medicinal plants. Our
land is spread across 4 hectares of fertile soil suitable for growing
plants where we also have a smoke room size 25 m3 .

For that production we seek a partner that would invest in us or
guarantee sales of our products.

I also do small business consulting as a volunteer in SCORE dedicated solely to small owner operator type businesses in the US.

lenders.occupational_info: I don't 'work', but I go to school five days a week. I go to the second best school in the nation (Pine View) and am extremely blessed to get such a good education. It is tough, but it will pay off when I get a really good job someday. I do have a small newspaper/magazine business though. I make, edit, and publish it with my friend for our neighborhood, I suppose we would be considered young entrepreneurs! :)

lenders.name: Brent
lenders.occupational_info: High School Student

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: I am representing the Fremont, CA fellowship group from the River of Life Christian Church.  It is our desire that God uses the money to bless all whom we support.  May God be glorified in all that we do.
lenders.occupational_info:
River of Life Christian Church is an international spiritual family, since we believe that the river of life will flow to all nations and their people and our church will become "A Home for All Nations." That is also the name of our church building.

River of Life Christian Church at Silicon Valley, was established under the leadership of Rev. Tong Liu in 1995, to fulfill the vision and mission from God to build a glorious church in the 21st century. This is a continuation of the vision and mission received by Rev. Zhao at Bread of Life Christian Church in Taiwan.

We believe that a glorious church begins with individuals’ lives. The development of all-rounded individuals depends on four major levers – Worship & Praise, Renewal by the Holy Spirit, Cell Church, and World Missions. God will send miraculous changes and blessings to our families, communities and nations through each of us.

Besides equipping our lives, God also led us to build 50 plus daughter churches in Mongolia, Africa and North America in the past years. The vision of River of Life Christian Church is to bring God’s blessings and wonders to every corner of the world through our daughter churches, as if a river enriches the surrounding soil as it travels from the origin to its destination. We embrace the tradition of giving, and firmly believe that "it’s better to give than to receive." We faithfully trust our resourceful God is fond of our act of being fully supportive of the needs of all daughter churches.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: people, planet, and profit are mutually sustainable.
lenders.occupational_info: Delivering a triple bottom line result on every business strategy.
